title: Ticket #7203: Starter crashes if preempted during file xfer in
description:
If the starter is transferring the sandbox into the scratch dir during startup, and the job is preempted, say with a condor_vacate -fast slot_name, the starter crashes during exit with the following stack trace: The problem is that the daemon_core singleton object is getting nulled out, but the file_transfer destructor is dereferencing it.

Note this doesn't happen in 8.9.5. I haven't tracked down which change fixed this, might have been one of the coverity-found fixes.

Also, with the exception of the core files, this bug has no user-visible impacts -- the core is generated as the starter is exit'ing, and the job has already completed normally.
